What determines damage bonus?
STR and SIZ, added together to look up on Table 1: Damage Bonus and Build

What is the effect of a combined STR and SIZ of 134?
1D4 added to hand-to-hand damage rolls

What is the effect of a combined STR and SIZ of 70?
1 point deducted from melee damage

Using the same figures as for damage bonus

No, damage bonus is not applied to firearms attacks

the cumulative damage inflicted upon an investigator, non-player character, or monster during the game

by adding CON and SIZ, then dividing the total by ten (rounding down any fractions)

What types of occupations are typically Lovecraftian?
Antiquarian, Author, Dilettante, Doctor of Medicine, Journalist, Police Detective, and Professor.
You are a helpful assistant.
How will the actual occupation of the investigator affect the game?
It will have limited effect during the game, influencing the investigator's starting skills and backstory.

What is the purpose of defining an investigator's occupation?
To help define the investigator's backstory.

No, some occupations are not typically found in a Lovecraft story, but may interest particular players.
